All Function

Submodules

src.nightFunc module

src.nightFunc.nightfunc(name)

Greeting function for this module, tell me what your name and i’m gonna greet you!

Parameters:

name (str) – input your name.

Returns:

greeting word.

Return type:

str

Example

myGreet = nightfunc(name='Nontaphat')
print(myGreet)

Output

"Hello Nontaphat!. My name is Night. Nice to meet you!"

src.yourinfoFunc module

src.yourinfoFunc.yourinfo(name, age, gender)

This function give me your information, so please fill in the information truthfully ;)

Parameters:

  • name (str) – input your name.

  • age (int) – input your age.

  • name – input your gender.

Returns:

your Personal information.

Return type:

str

Example

myinfo = yourinfo("Nontaphat","20","Male")
print(myinfo)

Output

name: Nontaphat
age: 20
gender: Male

src.yourtaskFunc module

src.yourtaskFunc.yourtask()

This function tell your remaining task, type the task number that you want to know about it”

Returns:

your task.

Return type:

str

Example

task number(1,2,3): 1

Output

study git

Task number & Return statement

Task number

return statement

1

study git

2

study sphinx & personal sphinx project

3

learn Ammonite source code
